inclusion.criterion: Rome IV criteria for the diagnosis of IBS
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: investigated to exclude other gastrointestinal organic cause(s)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: use of antibiotics or probiotics within 1 month prior to FMT
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: co-morbidity (kidney failure or chronic heart disease)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: serious psychiatric disorders or drug abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Wilson disease, which is a genetic disorder that can cause liver damage and other symptoms. However, the patient's IBS symptoms are moderate-to-severe, and they have been investigated to exclude other gastrointestinal organic causes.
